commit.message:
feat(ASGI): async multipart/form-data media handler (#1728)

* feat(ASGI): asynchronous multipart/form-data media handler

* fix(mypy): ignore typing for ASGI MultipartForm import hacks; also pin Sphinx

* Unpin Sphinx

* test(multipart): add E2E ASGI multipart tests with uvicorn/daphne

* test(asgi.stream): add an explicit test for BoundedStream.exhaust()

* docs(towncrier): add a news fragment for #1674 (ASGI+multipart/form-data)

* fix(asgi.reader): clean up and prevent runaway memory consumption in some cases

* Introduce buffer position as in WSGI (WiP)

* WiP: ASGI buffered reader polish

* WiP: misc ASGI reader optimization and polish

* docs(multipart): improve & tabify BodyPart.stream documentation

* docs(multipart): tweak some docstrings & comments as per review comments

* feat(multipart): address a couple more review comments

* docs(multipart): make the multipart frontpage example more consistent

* refactor(deprecation,errors): clean up errors.py import hierarchy & move DelimiterError in there

* refactor(testing,util): move invoke_coroutine_sync & runs_sync ⇒ util.sync

commit.message:
Improve cors middleware. (#1722)

feat(cors): add configuration options to the CORS middleware component

Allows customization of the list of allowed origins, the list of
origins that support credential and the additional headers to expose

commit.message:
refactor: improve error and status handling (#1701)

The class falcon.http_error.OptionalRepresentation and the attribute
falcon.HTTPError.has_representation were deprecated. The default error
serializer now generates a representation for every error type that derives from
falcon.HTTPError. In addition, Falcon now ensures that any previously set response body is cleared before handling any raised exception.

verification.payload:
tree bdcd6e76bf0d232121faad586fea58e8c2df90a3
parent d07e1fe99329d1a062ea36e71ea391d417ee1407
author Federico Caselli <CaselIT@users.noreply.github.com> 1591504386 +0200
committer GitHub <noreply@github.com> 1591504386 -0600

refactor: improve error and status handling (#1701)

The class falcon.http_error.OptionalRepresentation and the attribute
falcon.HTTPError.has_representation were deprecated. The default error
serializer now generates a representation for every error type that derives from
falcon.HTTPError. In addition, Falcon now ensures that any previously set response body is cleared before handling any raised exception.

docs: bring all reference pages up to date (#1716)

* doc(cookies): Add ASGI info

* docs: Make use of sphinx-tabs and tweak style

* docs(cors): Add ASGI info

* doc: Make Request and Response singular in doc titles to match class names

* doc(status): Convert HTTPStatus reference to a link

* doc(cookies): Make examples more generic so they work for ASGI and WSGI

* doc(style): Use '# -- snip --' consistently

* doc(errors): Add ASGI example and fixup TOC

* doc(media): Update for ASGI, etc.

* doc(middleware): Reorganize WSGI and ASGI interface descriptions into tabs

* doc(routing): Spring cleaning

* doc(status): Spring cleaning

* doc(testing): Spring cleaning

* doc: Make use of .. contents:: :local:

* doc(multipart): Reference req.get_media()

* doc: Normalize on # -- snip --
